participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and driven, Alex is passionate about her studies and values meaningful conversations.
participant_1.background: I've had to learn to live with the fact that my brother and I are not close. During the week I go to college to become a lawyer. I work in academia at a local university. I watch South Park at least once a day. My day has been wonderful as I've been writing and then enjoyed a cold glass of sweet tea.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, Jordan enjoys the simple pleasures of life and has a knack for finding joy in everyday activities.
participant_2.background: I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it. I curl up with a good book and my pets. I love to sleep in. I love meat. I walk through my new mansion and admire all the places where I can use my power tools to make it even better.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Pretty good! I just got back from work, and I'm about to curl up with a good book and my pets. What's up with you?
Same here! I'm actually about to start working on a paper for my college class. What kind of book are you reading?
It's a novel about a group of friends who go on a road trip. I'm really enjoying it!
That sounds really cool! I love road trips. What's your favorite kind of food?
I love meat! I could eat it every day. What about you?
I'm a vegetarian, but I love meatless options that taste just like meat.
That's really cool! I've never met a vegetarian before.
There are more of us than you think!
I'm sure! I just don't know any.
